scribble.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to write something quickly and untidily
scribble.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I scribbled his phone number in my address book.
scribble.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to draw marks that have no meaning
scribble.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Someone had scribbled all over my picture.
scribble.translation[1].definitions[0].d: meaningless marks or pictures, especially done by children
scribble.translation[1].definitions[1].d: untidy writing that is difficult to read
